attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
An action group has been formed by local residents, supported by local MP Shahid Malik, to save the Denby Dale nursery school, which could be closed or privatised as part of a review by Kirklees council. Parents are worried that if Denby Dale closes children will not have access to the same high-quality provision and that lower income families may not be able to find an alternative private provider

Please keep our nursery open as a council-run facility with high-quality pre-school teaching.

The recent Ofsted report said it was a good nursery with some outstanding features which provide an excellent stepping stone to primary school.

Why risk the devaluation of excellent facilities?

LEARN NOT EARN
